DialogueRoot.shop: What do you have for sale?
DialogueRoot.wantToAsk: I want to ask you something...

rumoursAnswers.string: @_Looks like the Lord's personal guard have an strict diet
@_The apothecary just to be a great poison expert
@_I don't know if it's true but some say that there's a big booty in a castle chamber.
@_The stables kid and the apothecary are great friends

uniqueQuestion.string: My name in Majorel, please to meet you
Where can I sleep around here?
Do you know if there is someone with a shady past, here in Cornwood Dale?

uniqueAnswers.string: @_At the George Tavern there's always a bed in exchange for coin
@_Hmmm... not sure. Maybe Mathias Brew the town wino.

uniqueQuestion.string: I need a coin, man. Can you help me out?

uniqueAnswers.string: @_Great! look I'm dating Rosita, the young girl next to the farm. She is amazing.
@_Mathias you've been a century inside your home. This is not like the old times, you have to do something with your life.

uniqueQuestion.string: So you used to kill people back then, right?
There are no words for how disgusting you are.
Who else were on your team

uniqueAnswers.string: No, I'm a red tentacle. Shut Up and give me the booze!
Yeah! And they used to scream and beg. What are you kid, the king's guard? Hahahaha!
Yes there are. You just never learned them
Ain't no snitch boy.If you use that bottle you have with me I'll tell you

uniqueQuestion.string: What can you tell me about Rosita?

uniqueAnswers.string: @_What? Do you like her? Haha, well she is allergic to snakes so don't put any near of her. I know you love those animals.

uniqueQuestion.string: Have you met the new girl?
*_Do you want to meet me at home?
/_Do you want to meet me at home?

uniqueAnswers.string: Yes. what about it, are you jealous? hohoho...
Of course, I'll see you there in 30 minutes

uniqueQuestion.string: Do you have any carrier pigeon?
Hey, do you know something about the trap there in the woods?

uniqueAnswers.string: @_No, but I'm sure you can find one at the stables
@_Oh yeah, I think Aldis uses it to catch snakes.
